medical_history.chief_complaint: The patient faced multiple challenges including profound bilateral sensorineural hearing loss, congenital bilateral cataracts, developmental delay, and gastro-esophageal reflux.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient was diagnosed with XXX at 1 year old. Hearing loss was detected early as she failed the newborn screening test. She received binaural hearing aids at 4 weeks old, with limited benefit. At age 4, she could communicate with simple vocalizations but struggled with behavioral audiometry due to cognitive issues. At age 5, she underwent left cochlear implantation, after which there were positive changes in response to sounds and increased alertness.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient was diagnosed with XXX at 1 year old. She had profound bilateral sensorineural hearing loss, congenital bilateral cataracts, developmental delay, and gastro-esophageal reflux.
